alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 05 at 3:16AM CDT until September 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 108 expected. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Sebastian County. In Oklahoma, Pushmataha, Choctaw, McIntosh, Pittsburg, Haskell, Latimer and Le Flore Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity will combine to create a dangerous situation in which heat illnesses are possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. To reduce risk during outdoor work the occupational safety and health administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency, call 911.
